bug.author: sherlockblaze
bug.description:
Hi there, I read the code, and find a little thing that's maybe not worth mentioning. I find the code in the file named IRToModel. There's a statement in it. <denchmark-code>elif args.framework == 'cntk': raise NotImplementedError("Destination [Tensorflow] is not implemented yet.") </denchmark-code>
The "Tensorflow" may be "cntk" here.
